Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add NIP-47 Nostr Wallet Connect (NWC) support for Arkade Zaps

Implement complete NIP-47 (Nostr Wallet Connect) server to enable native
Arkade payments via Nostr apps, replacing Lightning with Arkade vtxos.

Features:
- NWC server with NIP-47 protocol compliance
- Support for pay_invoice, get_balance, get_info, make_invoice methods
- Arkade addresses (ark1...) instead of Lightning invoices
- Direct vtxo transfers without Lightning/Boltz swaps
- Multi-relay support (relay.damus.io, nos.lol, relay.primal.net)
- QR code pairing UI with connection management
- Client pubkey auto-detection and update
- Connection persistence in localStorage
- Amount handling for Arkade addresses (stored separately)

Technical details:
- Kind 13194: Wallet info/capabilities announcement
- Kind 23194: Payment requests (encrypted via NIP-04)
- Kind 23195: Payment responses
- Millisats to sats conversion
- Unused connection reuse to avoid duplicates

UI additions:
- Settings > Wallet Connect screen
- QR code generation and display
- Connected apps management
- Copy pairing URL functionality

Tested with jumble Nostr client - successful 42 sat zap transfer.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
